title: 2015 Preview: Part One
description: Which industries are poised to have a big 2015?  Which emerging markets will emerge for investors?  Are energy companies undervalued?  Motley Fool Asset Management's Bill Mann and Tim Hanson tackle those questions in part one of our 2015 preview.  And we revisit our interview with How to Speak Money author John Lanchester.
content:encoded: Which industries are poised to have a big 2015?  Which emerging markets will emerge for investors?  Are energy companies undervalued?  Motley Fool Asset Management's Bill Mann and Tim Hanson tackle those questions in part one of our 2015 preview.  And we revisit our interview with How to Speak Money author John Lanchester.
